comments:
I saw this in my log.  I'm uncertain as to the steps to reproduce, but 
inspection of the code suggests that the visibleEditor might be null at this 
point, and we should probably defend against this case. 
 
No visible decrease in functionality when the exception is thrown.

fixed. protected the code in four places against null visibleEditor or null page. let me know if you see 
other problems.
